title: Re: Where are the real heroes?
content:
"Meh, they're only celebrities. Why isn't Tom Hall on this list?"
Aaaaargh, I entirely forgot! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] Kill me! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]
For some reason I was just thinking about musicians.. Yes, Tom Hall of course! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

I don't care about celebrities either, H.P. just happens to be the vocalist of my favourite band (thus favourite singer). He's not a celebrity. At least here.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
